overview:
The job responsibilities are to work as a speaker, trainer, and writer as well as providing risk analysis and responding to questions and concerns posed by the clients.

My daily work process includes:

1).Setting up online meeting or personal meeting (If required) with clients to discover their requirements for the consulting project. This involves being able to listen closely to understand what the customer wants to get from me or my organization. 2). Interacting with other businesses and professionals. 3). Invoicing, billing and collecting fees for consultations and services provided as a business consultant. 4). Developing good working relationships with professionals in-order to assist with locating information and correctly assessing the requirement.
